import React from 'react' import { FcDeleteDatabase } from 'react-icons/fc' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const CartItem = ({item,itemIndex}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); function removeFromCart(){ dispatch(remove(item.id)); } return (

{item.title}

{item.description}

{item.price}

) } export default CartItem
